definition: black birds having a raucous call, to express pleasure verbally
details:
noun
- black birds having a raucous call
- an instance of boastful talk
= synonyms: crowing, brag, bragging, vaporing, line-shooting, gasconade
- the cry of a cock, or an imitation of it
= example: the cry of a cock, or an imitation of it
verb
- to express pleasure verbally
= example: to express pleasure verbally
- to utter shrill sounds
= example: to utter shrill sounds
- to dwell on with satisfaction
= synonyms: triumph, gloat
